taxon_name.authority: ( Torrey & A. Gray) Torrey ex S. Stokes

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Polygonaceae;subfamily Eriogonoideae;genus Eriogonum;species hemipterum;variety hemipterum;

bio:treatment.discussion: Variety hemipterum is known in the flora area only from the Chisos Mountains of southern Brewster County. There the variety is infrequent to locally common. Variety griseum I. M. Johnston of Mexico differs in having leaf blades that are densely grayish-tomentose abaxially and strigose adaxially. It occurs in northwestern Coahuila and northeastern Chihuahua.
